data.name: secret formula
data.description:
Hey Igor,

i am well, thanks for asking.

This is formula for your homework that you asked.
First you add Gluon,
then post-transition metal that weight exactly 114,818u.
Next you need some Alkali metal from period 7 (don't mistake with group).
Something with atomic number 8.
Afterwards remember to add metal with melting point 2173,15K.
I hope you still remember villain from Greek mythology, son of Zeus and Plouto.
You also can't forget about lemon yellow sintered microcrystals.
Afterwards we add CAS 7440-61-1.
While mixing all ingredients, add again some Gluon.
Keep that away from very strong magnets.
Leave it for 30.2 minutes according to Bernard Courtois Guide Book.
Remember also to add a little of the lightest halogen.


Also this is secret message from me.
116 124 111 147 116 152 125 147 116 155 121 147 116 152 125 147 116 155 121 147 116 152 111 147 116 152 125 147 116 172 111 147 115 152 101 147 116 172 121 147 116 152 147 147 116 152 105 147 116 172 121 147 115 152 101 147 116 152 125 147 116 172 131 147 116 152 125 147 116 172 111 147 116 172 153 147 116 172 121 147 116 152 147 147 116 152 153 147 116 155 125 147 116 152 143 147 115 152 101 147 116 172 153 147 116 155 131 147 116 172 125 147 115 152 101 147 116 152 121 147 116 155 131 147 115 152 101 147 116 155 125 147 116 152 125 147 116 152 125 147 116 152 121 147 116 172 115 147 115 152 101 147 116 172 121 147 116 155 131 147 115 152 101 147 116 152 143 147 116 155 131 147 115 152 101 147 116 152 111 147 116 152 105 147 116 152 115 147 116 155 111 147 116 172 143 147 116 152 105 147 116 172 111 147 116 152 121 147 116 172 115 147 115 155 125 75

Best regards,
Heisenberg

PS: Wrap the flag in `ping{...}`. But remember - flag is case sensitive!

author: P1T4G0R45

Hey Igor,

i am well, thanks for asking.

This is formula for your homework that you asked. First you add Gluon, then post-transition metal that weight exactly 114,818u. Next you need some Alkali metal from period 7 (don't mistake with group). Something with atomic number 8. Afterwards remember to add metal with melting point 2173,15K. I hope you still remember villain from Greek mythology, son of Zeus and Plouto. You also can't forget about lemon yellow sintered microcrystals. Afterwards we add CAS 7440-61-1. While mixing all ingredients, add again some Gluon. Keep that away from very strong magnets. Leave it for 30.2 minutes according to Bernard Courtois Guide Book. Remember also to add a little of the lightest halogen.

Also this is secret message from me. 116 124 111 147 116 152 125 147 116 155 121 147 116 152 125 147 116 155 121 147 116 152 111 147 116 152 125 147 116 172 111 147 115 152 101 147 116 172 121 147 116 152 147 147 116 152 105 147 116 172 121 147 115 152 101 147 116 152 125 147 116 172 131 147 116 152 125 147 116 172 111 147 116 172 153 147 116 172 121 147 116 152 147 147 116 152 153 147 116 155 125 147 116 152 143 147 115 152 101 147 116 172 153 147 116 155 131 147 116 172 125 147 115 152 101 147 116 152 121 147 116 155 131 147 115 152 101 147 116 155 125 147 116 152 125 147 116 152 125 147 116 152 121 147 116 172 115 147 115 152 101 147 116 172 121 147 116 155 131 147 115 152 101 147 116 152 143 147 116 155 131 147 115 152 101 147 116 152 111 147 116 152 105 147 116 152 115 147 116 155 111 147 116 172 143 147 116 152 105 147 116 172 111 147 116 152 121 147 116 172 115 147 115 155 125 75
